documentation.text:
@title WhitelistedCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.
@dev Reverts if beneficiary is not whitelisted. Can be used when extending this contract.

@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
 @param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist

@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
 @param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist

@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
 @param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist

@title WhitelistedCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.
@dev Reverts if beneficiary is not whitelisted. Can be used when extending this contract.

@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
 @param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist

@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
 @param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist

@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
 @param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist

devdoc.details: Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.

addManyToWhitelist(address[]).details: Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.

params._beneficiaries: Addresses to be added to the whitelist

params._beneficiary: Address to be added to the whitelist

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

params._beneficiary: Address to be removed to the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: the address where funds are collected.

devdoc.title: WhitelistedCrowdsale
